thing-type.label: TSM02 Slim Multi-Sensor
thing-type.description: Slim Multi-Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtPIR, door/window, temperature and illumination, 4 sensors function in one.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds will enter inclusion mode</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds will enter exclusion mode</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtIf the user want to wake-up the device immediately, please remove the front cover, and press the tamper key once.</p&gt <p&gtThe device will wake-up 10 seconds</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Basic Set Level
parameter.description: Basic Set Level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt-1 -&gt; 0xFF(-1) turns on the light.</p&gt <p&gt1 - 100 -&gt; For dimmers 1 to 100 means the light strength</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: PIR Sensitivity
parameter.description: PIR Sensitivity<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtparameter to set the Sensitivity for the PIR (Passive Infrared Sensor)</p&gt <p&gt0 -&gt; 0 means disable the PIR motion;</p&gt <p&gt1 - 99 -&gt; 1 means the lowest sensitivity, 99 means the highest sensitivity</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Light Threshold
parameter.description: Light Threshold<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSetting the illumination threshold to turn on the light. When the event triggered and the environment illumination lower then the threshold, the device will turn on the light</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gt0 means turn off illumination detected function. And never turn on the light.</li&gt <li&gt1 means darkest.</li&gt <li&gt99 means brightest.</li&gt <li&gt100 means turn off illumination detected function. And always turn on the light.</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Operation Mode
parameter.description: Operation Mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<h1&gtBit 0:</h1&gt <ul&gt<li&gt1 means security mode;</li&gt <li&gt0 means home automation mode.</li&gt </ul&gt<h1&gtBit 1:</h1&gt <ul&gt<li&gt1 means enable test mode;</li&gt <li&gt0 means disable test mode.</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtNotice</strong&gt: Bit0 and bit1 will effect when the DIP Switch setting to program mode. If bit1 is enabled, the bit0 is useless.</p&gt <h1&gtBit2:</h1&gt <p&gtDisable the door/window function.</p&gt <h1&gtBit3:</h1&gt <p&gtSetting the temperature scale</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Multi-Sensor Function Switch
parameter.description: Multi-Sensor Function Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gtBit 0: Disable magnetic integrate illumination.</li&gt <li&gtBit 1: Disable PIR integrate Illumination.</li&gt <li&gtBit 2: Disable magnetic integrate PIR (Default is Disable)</li&gt <li&gtBit 3: When Bit2 is 0 (Enable), the device is install in the same room with the light? <ul&gt<li&gt0: In the same room(Default),</li&gt <li&gt1: In the different room.</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit4: Disable delay 5 seconds to turn off the light, when door/window closed.</li&gt <li&gtBit5: Disable auto turn off the light, after door/window opened to turn on the light.</li&gt <li&gtBit6:Enable temperature monitoring. When this bit enable, the temperature changed 3 degree Fahrenheit, it will report.</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtAnd also the temperature over 140 degree Fahrenheit, it will report every 64 seconds.</p&gt <p&gt<strong&gtNotice</strong&gt: If bit2 is zero, this setting is useless</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: PIR Re-Detect Interval Time
parameter.description: PIR Re-Detect Interval Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIn the security mode, after the PIR motion detected, setting the re-detect time. 8 seconds per tick, and minimum time is 24 seconds, default tick is 3 (24 seconds).</p&gt <p&gtSetting the suitable value to prevent received the trigger signal too frequency. Also can save the battery energy.</p&gt <p&gt<strong&gtNotice</strong&gt: If this value bigger than the configuration setting NO. 9. There is a period after the light turned off and the PIR not detecting</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Turn Off Light Time
parameter.description: Turn Off Light Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtAfter turn on the light, setting the delay time to turn off the light when the PIR motion is not detected. 8 seconds per tick, and minimum time is 32 seconds, default tick is 4 (32 seconds)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Auto Report Battery Time
parameter.description: Auto Report Battery Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval time for auto report the battery level. 30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours). </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Auto Report Door/Window State Time
parameter.description: Auto Report Door/Window State Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval time for auto report the door/window state. 30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours).</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Auto Report Illumination Time
parameter.description: Auto Report Illumination Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval time for auto report the illumination. 30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours).</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Auto Report Temperature Time
parameter.description: Auto Report Temperature Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval time for auto report the temperature. 30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours).</p&gt</p&gt
